alert.note: Alert for Dawson; Furnas; Gosper (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Hastings (North Central Kansas and South Central Nebraska)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued November 23 at 2:49AM CST until November 25 at 6:00PM CST by NWS Hastings
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 6 AM FRIDAY TO 6 PM CST SATURDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations between 2 and 4 inches. * WHERE...Dawson, Furnas, and Gosper Counties. * WHEN...From 6 AM Friday to 6 PM CST Saturday. * IMPACTS...Plan on potentially slippery road conditions for post-holiday travel. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...It will not snow throughout the entire duration of this Advisory, with snow instead falling intermittently. There is also some uncertainty in snow amounts, as dry air could potentially delay the onset of snow and reduce amounts, especially on Friday. No matter how much it snows, confidence is high that blowing and drifting snow will not be a significant issue, with winds only averaging 5 to 15 MPH, from the east most of the time but shifting to westerly Saturday afternoon.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
